about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting world of quizzes and intellectual challenges!

FizzQuiz is a unique game that offers over 100 topics and 10,000 questions designed for true quiz lovers. Play with friends, compete in various rounds, and prove that you're the ultimate trivia master!

Game Features:

  • Wide Range of Topics: Choose from more than 100 topics — from history and science to movies and music. Your game will never get boring!
  • Diverse Questions: Experience questions with text, images, videos, and audio. Use your knowledge and intuition to find the correct answers.
  • Cropped Images: Face a new level of difficulty with cropped images that will test your attention to detail and associative thinking.
  • Seven Unique Rounds: Each round presents a new challenge. Prove yourself and defeat your friends, earn bonuses, and become the quiz champion!
  • Play with Friends: FizzQuiz allows up to 10 players to play simultaneously. Gather your team and enjoy the game together!
  • Earn Points: Earn points for every correct answer. Collect bonuses for a series of correct answers and outpace your competitors.
  • Tailored Experience: Choose topics you like and complete quizzes with different difficulty levels.

How to Play:

  • Choose a Topic: Start the game by selecting one of the many available topics.
  • Answer the Questions: Go through seven rounds, answering questions in various formats — text, images, videos, and audio.
  • Compete with Friends: Play together with friends or other players worldwide and find out who the best quizzer is!
  • Earn Points and Defeat Your Friends: Answer correctly, earn points, and improve your ranking.

Join FizzQuiz!

Test your knowledge and enjoy playing with FizzQuiz. Play anytime, anywhere — with friends or solo. Show everyone that you are the true trivia master!

FizzQuiz — the game that challenges your intellect!
